description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: A post-Olympic contest in yachting held at Kiel Bay; the exchange of ambassadors between the Federal Republic and China; Berlin's Kurfurstendamm, its shops, entertainments and meeting places; the Henschel Works, once a foundary for the casting of church bells, seen now as one of the world's leading locomotive manufacturers; and a look at one of Germany's oldest horse breeding centres - the Wuttemberg Central Stud Farm at Marbach.
